name: Miso Glazed Carrots
keywords: carrot, miso, vegetable stock, side dish, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: Salt and ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In medium, heavy skillet, heat sesame oil over medium-high heat. Add onion and carrots. Cook, stirring occasionally, about 6 minutes, until soft on edges but not brown.

In small bowl, cream miso with 1/4 cup broth. Stir this mixture, remaining broth, orange zest and ginger into carrots and onions. Reduce heat, and simmer for 12 to 15 minutes, until liquid is reduced to a glaze and carrots are crisp-tender.
Stir in roasted sesame oil. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
